post_title: Working hours during Christmas in Prague

comments.author: Tall-Ad3171
comments.body:
The 24th is the main day of celebration in Czech Republic. Everything will either close early or be closed all together. Youâ€™ll likely need to rely on tourist spots for dinner etc.

I imagine the 25th will be a bit easier, then 26th will probably be back to normal.

Feel free to use my itinerary on your trip.

https://wanderlog.com/view/zarnvtlzwi/trip-to-prague/shared
